NPC ID2813

The shop keeper is in charge of the Lumbridge General Store in Lumbridge. He is assisted by the shop assistant (Lumbridge). The shop keeper plays a minor role in the Death to the Dorgeshuun. He is one of the humans Zanik meets while visiting Lumbridge. He sells her a wooden bucket, a wood hammer, and a newcomer map.
